General.Name: Sunrise Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunrise Group Company Limited engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of food and beverage packaging containers in China. The company offers beverage cans and food cans, including three-piece cans, two-piece cans, and aluminum bottle products, and metal packaging products. It also engages in the beverage filling, appearance packaging design, and logistics support business, as well as research and development, design, printing, production, distribution, filling, and information intelligent data services. In addition, the company offers color and digital printing, photoelectric lighting, and value-added services. Further, it provides supply chain management services; easy-open lids; bottle caps; and energy-saving products. The company was formerly known as Shengxing Group Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Sunrise Group Company Limited in December 2019. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China. Sunrise Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shengxing Holdings Co., Ltd.
